<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Liveness probe handler (`GET /livez`)."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/livez"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns 200 immediately — no dependency checks. A failing liveness probe
causes Kubernetes to restart the pod, so this only confirms the process
is responsive (FR-001).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

>
  
</RequestSchema>

</StatusCodes>
